(I need Yanshosh to post before I can land the ship. I need you guys 
to sit tight. Poor fool...lives on the west side and in a complete 
different time zone. But when we get up he still sleep, so it evens 
out.)

Vulois' image nods.

"There you go. You have your question. Peace. Now give me your 
answer."

______________________________________________________________________
Prebon


Prebon checked in on the prisoner. Still unconsious. He needed his 
information now. He went to Spears.

"I have some questions to ask you. Specifically who are the main 
leaders of the Maximals."
